about_the_game:
Knight of Nevermore is a roguelike action-platformer, featuring challenging but fair combat, finely-tuned level generation and an item pool filled with combos and synergies.

Made for Replayability

Each time you enter Nevermore, it's ever-changing levels offer a unique selection of items, weapons and spells. Become a mighty fighter, cast powerful spells, or scale your stats to godlike strength - every run presents different build possibilities.

Challenging Combat

The denizens of Nevermore won't go down without a fight! Your enemies have a variety of attacks at their disposal, and you'll need to defend yourself accordingly. Triumph in battle by learning enemy move-sets and keeping your wits sharp.

Meaningful Choices

Sculpt your build with powerful synergies and manage your resources carefully. Should you reroll an item, or should you use the healing fountain before the next fight? You can't have it all, so choose wisely.

Rich in Gameplay, Light in Story

If you're the kind of gamer who relishes a challenge and who would rather be pressing buttons than reading dialogue, then Knight of Nevermore is the game for you!
